article_title: Arraignment Set for Pleasant Hill Shooting Spree Suspect
article_text:
PLEASANT HILL, Iowa — A man accused of going on a shooting spree in Pleasant Hill two weeks ago will get to answer to the charges next month.

Thirty-two-year-old Pete Polson is charged with two counts of attempted murder and a number of other charges. Police say he shot at three people in Pleasant Hill on November 17th, seriously injuring two of them.

According to court documents, Polson will be arraigned January 7th.
